trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_RowUpdated" name="RowUpdated" href=""></xref> event of a .NET Framework data provider.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för den <xref uid="langword_csharp_RowUpdated" name="RowUpdated" href=""> </xref> händelsen för en .NET Framework-dataprovidern.

trans-unit.source: The `RowUpdated` event message is typically raised when an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> to a row is completed.
trans-unit.target: Den `RowUpdated` händelsemeddelandet är vanligtvis aktiveras när en <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>till en rad har slutförts.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> sent through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> skickas via en <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> executed when <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> is called.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> utförs när <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>anropas.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The type of SQL statement executed.
trans-unit.target: Typ av SQL-instruktion kördes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> sent through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref> skickas via en <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> executed when <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> is called.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> utförs när <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>anropas.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> executed when <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> is called.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> utförs när <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>anropas.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Copies references to the modified rows into the provided array.
trans-unit.target: Kopierar referenser till ändrade rader i den angivna matrisen.

trans-unit.source: `array` must be at least <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.RowCount%2A> in length.
trans-unit.target: `array`måste vara minst <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.RowCount%2A>längd.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.RowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> for a null instance of <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>för en null-instans av <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to copy into.
trans-unit.target: Matris med <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> ska kopieras till.

trans-unit.source: Copies references to the modified rows into the provided array.
trans-unit.target: Kopierar referenser till ändrade rader i den angivna matrisen.

trans-unit.source: `array` must be at least <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.RowCount%2A> + `arrayIndex` in length.
trans-unit.target: `array`måste vara minst <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.RowCount%2A>+ `arrayIndex` längd.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.RowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> for a null instance of <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>för en null-instans av <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to copy into.
trans-unit.target: Matris med <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> ska kopieras till.

trans-unit.source: The index in the array to start copying into.
trans-unit.target: Index i matrisen ska börja kopiera till.

trans-unit.source: Gets any errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> was executed.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar alla fel som genereras av .NET Framework-dataprovidern när den <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>utfördes.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>

trans-unit.source: The errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> was executed.
trans-unit.target: Fel som genereras av .NET Framework-dataprovidern när den <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>utfördes.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted by execution of the SQL statement.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar antalet rader ändras, infogas eller tas bort genom att köra SQL-instruktionen.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted; 0 if no rows were affected or the statement failed; and -1 for SELECT statements.
trans-unit.target: Antalet rader som ändras, infogas eller tas bort; 0 om inga rader påverkades eller instruktionen misslyckades. och 1 för SELECT-satser.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> sent through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> skickas via en <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: When batching is enabled, the value of this property will be null.
trans-unit.target: När batchbearbetning aktiveras, ska värdet för den här egenskapen vara null.

trans-unit.source: Updated rows can be accessed through one of the `RowUpdatedEventArgs.CopyToRows` methods.
trans-unit.target: Uppdaterade rader kan nås via en av de `RowUpdatedEventArgs.CopyToRows` metoder.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> sent through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> skickas via en <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows processed in a batch of updated records.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar antalet rader som bearbetas i en batch med uppdaterade poster.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref> that specifies the number of row processed.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref>som anger antalet rader som bearbetas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of SQL statement executed.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar typ av SQL-instruktion kördes.

trans-unit.source: StatementType can be one of the following values: - Select - Insert - Update - Delete
trans-unit.target: StatementType kan vara något av följande värden: - Välj - Insert - Update - Delete

trans-unit.source: The type of SQL statement executed.
trans-unit.target: Typ av SQL-instruktion kördes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> of the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> property.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"> </xref> av den <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: En av de <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"> </xref> värden.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Continue" name="Continue" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_Continue" name="Continue" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> sent through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref> skickas via en <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> sent through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref> skickas via en <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>
